name: Wartrain Mount
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Ultimate Magic. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a swatch of black cloth)
text: You instill the target animal with the combat training general purpose (see Handle Animal). This supersedes the animal's previous trained purpose and any tricks it knows. When the spell ends, it reverts to its previous trained purpose and known tricks.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一块黑布)
target_zh: 一只中立或友好的动物
text_zh:
法术抗力 可

你给目标动物灌输通用战斗技巧 (见驯养动物)。这将取代该动物目前所受过的训练和知悉的技巧。当法术结束时，它将恢复以前受过的训练和已知的技巧。
